body.name: Jean-Patrique Stonetastic Granite Nonstick Frying Pans - Set of 3 Induction Frying Pans Non Stick - Frying Pan Set for All Types of Stove Tops & Oven Safe 7.8 inch, 9.4 inch, 11 inch
features: Set of 3 Non-Stick Frying Pans: Put the joy back into cooking with our beautiful granite nonstick frying pan. From baked eggs to fried bacon - this non stick frying pan set can handle it all, with three silky smooth pans strong enough to last a lifetime.

Silky Smooth and Scratch-Free: The granite coating of the cooking pan not only looks and feels amazing, but provides a non-stick, scratch-resistant surface that makes cooking a breeze and cleaning even easier.

Solid as a Rock: Non stick frying pans are constructed from forged aluminum with a granite coating for outstanding strength and durability. With handles made from high-strength stainless steel, these pans are built to last.
Works on All Stove Tops: Compatible with all stove tops including induction stoves, electric stoves, ceramic stoves and gas stoves. Plus, oven safe up to 280 °C.

Versatile Gift Option: Includes three versatile sizes perfect for any task, Small (20 cm / 7.8 inch diameter), Medium (24 cm / 9.4 inch diameter) and Large (28 cm / 11 inch diameter). If you a looking for Christmas kitchen gifts or kitchen gifts for women or men – this is your choice.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: COMPLETE YOUR KITCHEN Chopaholic 3 Piece Knife Set Large Salad Bowl with Utentils Oval Tapas Serving Dishes SET OF 3 This set comes with 8” chef’s knife, 6” chef’s knife and 4” chef’s knife. LARGE WOODEN SALAD BOWL The 26cm wooden bowl is large enough to store salad for the whole family. THREE CLASSIC COLOURS An elegant trio of Butterscotch, Pistachio and Cranberry. HIGH CARBON STAINLESS STEEL Made from high carbon 3Cr13 stainless steel for strength and sharp edges SUPERIOR STAINLESS STEEL The fork and spoon is made from high quality stainless steel for durability. SUPERIOR CERAMIC CONSTRUCTION The non-stick, durable ceramic coating is long lasting and easy to clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Great pans. Works well. Only drawback is the handles get just as hot as the pan. Use an oven mitt when your cooking or you will burn your hands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are great pans! July 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love these pans. I just ordered them a couple weeks ago, so I cannot speak to their life-span, but for the price they are awesome. They are super easy to clean. The food does not stick at all, and the coating doesnt seem like something that is going to peel off. Heat distribution seems great. My husband and I are both chefs, so we do some hefty cooking at home, and the pans do just fine. They are not as heavy duty as some $$$$ sets like All Clad...but I knew that going in of course!!! And for the price, I did not expect the quality of professional cook ware. Anyway, I love these pans. 5 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Skillets are easy to clean & great heat distribution!
reviews.reviewText: Nice sizes & easy to clean; however, handles get very hot even if on eye a few minutes! Make sure you have pothole or dishrag close, I almost dropped first time used! Still worth the money at that price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent lightweight non stick pans.
reviews.reviewText: These pans are extremely light. Using an induction cooker I have not experienced the handles getting hot. Also the largest size pan's external base sofar has remained flat. On the inside is the center is slightly raised compared to the periphery, the same applies to the middle sized one. This doesnot seem to matter much in the daily usage. It is true that it would have been nice if they had come with lids,however a well known Swedish company sells universal lids made of a soft rubber like material which addresses the problem somewhat. The fact that the pans are not dishwasher compatible is a little disappointing, but as the pans are easy to clean, it is something I can live with.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gift for my daughter

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Too Hot to Handle!
reviews.reviewText: The handles on these pans got hot instantly! And they were as hot as the skillet that was on fire! My hubby used one first and when he complained I thought he was being whiney. Then a few minutes later, I cooked something. I simply moved the handle (didn't grab it - just pushed it away to keep from accidentally bumping into it while cooking.) I literally burnt my fingers! I've been cooking 50 years and I've never felt handles this HOT!! Protection needs to be added. Someone is going to get hurt!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy cooking and cleaning pans
reviews.reviewText: Love them! I’m a big fan of good quality cooking pots and pans 👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I like the cookware but I do not like the bump in the center of the large sized pan (first photo) it is noticeably not in the medium sized pan nor the smallest pan. The bump in the pan makes the food roll to the outskirts of the pan not giving the even heat distribution as promised.Wonder if it is a defect

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on March 14, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Really fantastic pans. Very light weight which at first made me think low quality but absolutely the opposite. Excellent quality and easy to clean, the best pans I’ve bought in years. The handles do get a bit hot so sometimes have to use a cloth to pick them up but the pans are so good it is a very small payoff for quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 28, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: Truly non stick and easy clean, they cook brilliantly
reviews.reviewText: I love these pans. They just wipe clean with a dishcloth, no scrubbing. The food does not stick so they cook fantastically with the minimum of oil, or fry light if you are counting the calories. They aren’t too heavy to handle and they cook very efficiently.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Nice set of frying pans, at a good price.
reviews.reviewText: Set of different size frying pans. They are easy to clean and are lightweight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My daughter recommended these and I’m so glad I purchased them. Fantastic for cooking and cleaning is a breeze. Highly recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on March 3, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Love these pans. The non-stick quality is excellent; so easy to wash and not too heavy. One tiny issue, the handle can get a bit hot, but not a major problem if you have pan covers. Would definitely recommend.
